main event: A UFO Advisory Panel Meeting was held on 27 July 1959 to discuss various UFO investigations and trends.
interesting points: Dr. Hynek emphasized that more serious scientists in France are interested in UFOs than in the U.S.,Aime Michel presented his views on UFOs during his meeting with Dr. Hynek,The panel discussed trends from statistics collected in the first half of 1959,The meeting addressed an airline pilot sighting that was concluded to be a meteorological balloon,The discussion included a photograph of an unidentified flying object taken in Norway, which could not be conclusively identified.
witness description: Members of the UFO Advisory Panel including scientists and military personnel
